changelog.metadescription: KoolTreeView is the excellent treeview control for PHP, combining highly-efficient rendering and AJAX Load on Demand support for superior performance.
changelog.metakeywords: php treeview, php tree view, php tree, ajax treeview, php ajax treeview
changelog.log: - Fix client-side conflict with MooTools framework.
- Add new client-side function addData()
- Fix rendering issue in IE.
- Enhance css style.
- Enhance adding data function.
- Registering CSS is improved. - Improve the edit input: Enter key will not cause postback
- Enhance styleFolder property.
- Enhance styles and render to make KoolTreeView comply to XHTML1.0 strict. - Modify the javascript rendering to improve rendering speed of KoolTreeView
- Enhance the RenderTree() function.
- New property added: scriptFolder for manually setting the path to script folder.
- Improve the loading image in IE when doctype is used. - Enhance TreeNode::loadSubNode() function
- Enhance KoolTreeView working with KoolScripting. - Enhance working of moveToBelow() function in IE
- Enhance drag and drop action. - Modify the wrong function name moveToBellow() to the correct one moveToBelow()

- New TreeNode::addChildNode(): This will extend capability of creating node at client-side. - New set of method for TreeNode to control select,drag,drop and edit options: o TreeNode::disableSelect() o TreeNode::disableDrag() o TreeNode::disableDrop() o TreeNode::disableEdits() - Enhance the working of TreeNode::addData() function.
- Make KoolTreeView work better inside UpdatePanel. - Some minor improvement related to treeview rendering.
- New feature: KoolTreeView now is able to keep its state persisted. View demo - Some enhancements related to TreeView style.
- Enhance the render of JS library's absolute path.
- Enhance styles of KoolTreeView when working with IE Transitional Doctype. - Make dynamic loading work better.
- Make KoolTreeView work better with WAMP Server
- Enhance KoolTreeView to work when short_open_tags settings of PHP is disabled.
- Solve the issue of setting height and overflow properties. - Enhance behavior of edit node.
- TreeView style has been improved very much. - New property showLines: TreeView is able to on/off showing lines connection between nodes. - Enhanced the Drag and Drop behavior

- Total new structure in rendering the tree which is smaller in size, faster in loading, more compatible with latest browser. - Drag and Drop feature is available. - Edit Node feature now is available. - Enhance the sub tree loading.
- Enhance KoolTreeView to work better in Linux environment.
- KoolTreeView is first released.
